verses.text: Mamin Jehová, yelxo val te wach' ach t'ayonh a onh a chonhab' onh tik. Ix onh ik'xi meltzaj b'aj sacleminac cajcanb'at a onh yinhtil onh vinhaj Jacob tik.
Ix a sucsat co chukal a onh a chonhab' onh tik. Ix ak' lajvoc masanil co mul.
Ix a yamoch vaan yoval a k'ool yet' a k'ak'alk'olal.
Ach co Diosal, co Columal, ochanh qued'oc junelxo, yechelocxob' ste cot yoval a k'ol t'ayonh.
¿Tom anheja' ol cotnhej oval t'ayonh t'a masanil tiempo?
¿Tom manhxo ol ak'xi co tek'anil yic wach' tzonh tzalaj ed'oc a onh a chonhab' onh tik?
Ach Jehová, ch'oxcan a wach'k'olal t'ayonh, tzonh a colanpaxeli.
Ol vab' tas ol yal Jehová Dios t'ayonh. Ol yak' junk'olal t'ayonh schonhab' onh tik, tato mantzac co k'ulej manh pensaril.
Yeltoni, b'ecan sk'ol Dios skolwaj t'a eb' ay tz'och emnaquil t'ay, yic wach' scheclaj stziquiquial t'a co cal.
Ol yak' swach'k'olal Dios t'a eb' schonhab', haxo eb' ol k'anab'ajan t'ay. Ha eb' anima tojol sb'eyb'al, ol ak'joc sjunk'olal eb' yuj Dios.
k'anab'ajum ol aj eb' anima t'a sat lum tik. Axo Dios, ato t'a satcha’anh ol yak'cot scolval.
Ol yak'cot swach'k'olal Jehová, ol yak'an sat jantac tas scavej t'a sat co lum tik.
Ha tojolal ol b'ab'laj cot yuj Jehová, ha' ol tojolb'itan b'e b'aj ol javoc.
